item.title: Drum and Bass Piano
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A video I made by myself, having for idea the representation of the famous Drum and Bass drum breaks as an impossible piano composition. It also served me as a very good exercise to pratice cinematic techniques of filming, using an IMAX film ratio.I had loads of fun doing this, and that let me join […]
item.content:encoded:
A video I made by myself, having for idea the representation of the famous Drum and Bass drum breaks as an impossible piano composition. It also served me as a very good exercise to pratice cinematic techniques of filming, using an IMAX film ratio.
I had loads of fun doing this, and that let me join my love for Drum and Bass as well as rendering and film making.

item.title: Bassin minier du Nord-pas-de-Calais – 2024
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Post endo-colonial suggestion renders
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: This series of rendering serves as illustration for an citizen led re-appropriation of private place in Saint-Denis, France.Per the project of Salma Khobalatte and Lucie Leccia, the renderings serve as to suggest, not illustrate, a possible post endo-colonial future of a historical poor and diverse city in the suburbs of Paris.
item.content:encoded:
This series of rendering serves as illustration for an citizen led re-appropriation of private place in Saint-Denis, France.
Per the project of Salma Khobalatte and Lucie Leccia, the renderings serve as to suggest, not illustrate, a possible post endo-colonial future of a historical poor and diverse city in the suburbs of Paris.
